name: Snow Dash (QWERTYS7GP)
description:
Snow Dash is a game made on Scratch. It was made on Feb 11, 2022, as one of my first platformers.

It's a platformer with additional stuff such as skins, points, and more updates!!

Click here for the original game on Scratch

Thanks to TurboWarp Packager for helping me make this happen

The updated version is on Scratch, this is only v.1.2

Remember, if you can't download it, it's on Scratch!

Plz donate
